title: Game-Based Workshop for Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with digital learning tools and foundational expertise in science
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen competencies in designing TEL activities using mobile devices and gamification elements for professionals in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain TEL activity design processes at over 80% accuracy through game-based collaborative activities
Learners can complete 100% of draft TEL scenarios for science fields using digital card game tools
Learners achieve over 75% of communication and collaboration effectiveness in TEL activities designed through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
